title: aria-selected attribute
description: Indicates the current "selected" state of various widgets. See related aria-checked and aria-pressed.

assertions.title: convey undefined value by indicating that the element is not selectable
examples: A screen reader might imply that the the element is not selectable by not announcing the selected state at all.

assertions.title: convey false value by indicating that the element can be selected
examples: A screen reader might announce something like "not selected".

assertions.title: convey true value by indicating that the element is currently selected
examples: A screen reader might announce something like "selected".
